title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid input data and the appropriate role is assigned with pending approval status.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth registration page.
Input valid registration details including username, email, password, and select a valid role.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the user is created with status as 'pending approval'.
Verify that a confirmation message about pending approval is displayed.

title: User Registration Validation Errors
description: Verify that appropriate validation messages are shown for registration inputs with invalid or missing data.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth registration page.
Submit registration with empty or invalid email and password fields.
Verify validation error messages for missing required fields are shown.
Input mismatched password and confirmation.
Verify password mismatch validation error is displayed.
Input unsupported role.
Verify error is shown for invalid role selection.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify user login with correct credentials routes to the role-specific dashboard successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to /auth login page.
Enter valid email and password credentials for an approved user.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to their role-based dashboard.

title: User Login Failure - Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login attempt with incorrect email or password is rejected with an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to /auth login page.
Enter invalid or unregistered email or incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that unauthorized access to protected routes redirects users to login or an error page based on authentication and role permissions.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard URL without logging in.
Verify user is redirected to login page.
Login as a student user and attempt to access course creation page.
Verify access is denied and proper error or redirect occurs.
Login as teacher and attempt to access user management page.
Verify access is denied for unauthorized roles.

title: Course Creation Workflow
description: Verify that authorized users (Admin or Super Admin) can create a course successfully through the guided course wizard with all mandatory details.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Create Course page or start Course Wizard.
Fill in required course details including title, description, categories, and permissions.
Complete course wizard steps including modules and materials setup.
Submit and create the course.
Verify course is created successfully and visible in course list.
Verify creator has appropriate access to edit the course.

title: Course Editing and Module Management
description: Verify authorized users can edit existing courses, add, update or remove modules and materials.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Teacher with permissions.
Navigate to an existing course's edit page.
Modify the course title and description.
Add a new module with materials.
Update existing module details.
Remove an existing module or material.
Save changes.
Verify changes are saved correctly and reflected accurately in course details.

title: Library Content Upload and Metadata Management
description: Verify authorized roles can upload PDF books and videos successfully, add metadata, generate thumbnails, and manage library content.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Teacher with library upload permissions.
Navigate to the Library Upload Content page.
Upload a valid PDF file with metadata.
Verify PDF is uploaded, thumbnail is generated, and metadata is stored.
Upload a video file (or provide YouTube/Vimeo URL).
Verify video is embedded or playable, and metadata can be edited.
Edit metadata of existing library items.
Verify that metadata updates are saved and reflected.

title: Course Enrollment Scenarios
description: Validate that students can enroll themselves in courses with self-enrollment enabled and verify bulk/admin enrollment workflows function properly.

steps.description: Login as a Student.
Navigate to course list and enroll in a self-enrollable course.
Verify enrollment success and course access.
Login as Admin.
Enroll multiple students to a course via bulk enrollment interface.
Verify all students are enrolled successfully.
Login as Teacher.
Enroll a student via teacher enrollment control.
Verify enrollment is reflected in the student’s course list and progress dashboard.

title: Assignment Creation and Submission Workflow
description: Verify teachers can create, assign, and grade assignments and students can submit assignments with feedback visible.

steps.description: Login as Teacher.
Create a new assignment with title, description, due date, and attached materials.
Verify assignment appears in the assignment list for the course.
Login as Student enrolled in the course.
Submit the assignment before the due date.
Verify submission is received and timestamped.
Login as Teacher.
Grade submitted assignment and provide feedback.
Verify student can view the grade and feedback on their dashboard.

title: User Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify that admins can create, edit, deactivate/reactivate, and delete users, including role assignment and permission configuration.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to the User Management page.
Create a new user with valid details and assign a role.
Verify the new user appears in the user list with correct role.
Edit existing user details and change role.
Verify the changes are saved and displayed correctly.
Deactivate and then reactivate a user account.
Verify user account status updates appropriately and user access reflects the status.
Delete a user.
Verify user is removed from the system and cannot log in.

title: Role-Based Dashboards Display
description: Verify that each user type (Super Admin, Admin, Teacher, Student, Guardian) sees their specific dashboard with correct analytics and quick-access features.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin and view dashboard.
Verify detailed system monitoring and user management analytics are visible.
Login as Admin and view dashboard.
Verify course creation and enrollment management stats are shown.
Login as Teacher and view dashboard.
Verify lesson management, assignment tracking, and student attendance widgets appear.
Login as Student and view dashboard.
Verify progress tracking, enrolled courses, and upcoming assignments are displayed.
Login as Guardian and view dashboard.
Verify linked students’ progress and assignment status are viewable in read-only mode.

title: System Monitoring Access and Data Verification
description: Verify that only Admin and Super Admin users can access the system monitoring tools and that accurate analytics and health indicators display.

steps.description: Attempt to access system monitoring as a Student or Teacher.
Verify access is denied or redirected.
Login as Admin and navigate to System Monitoring page.
Verify system performance data, health indicators, and analytics charts are displayed.
Login as Super Admin and verify same access and data visibility.

title: Theme Switching and Responsiveness
description: Validate dark/light theming functionality and verify UI responsiveness and accessibility compliance across devices.

steps.description: Toggle the theme switch on dashboard or settings page.
Verify UI theme updates instantly between dark and light modes.
Resize browser window or test on mobile device.
Verify layout and UI components adapt properly and remain usable.
Run accessibility checks on key pages including form elements, navigation, and content.
Verify the UI complies with accessibility standards (e.g. ARIA labels, keyboard navigation).

title: Session Management and Token Handling
description: Verify secure token storage, proper session management, and auto-refresh capabilities maintain user authentication without interruption.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Verify session tokens are securely stored (e.g. httpOnly cookie or secure storage).
Leave the session idle until token refresh is triggered.
Verify session token auto-refresh mechanism successfully extends session without login prompt.
Manually revoke tokens or trigger session expiration.
Verify user is logged out and redirected to login page.

title: Assignment Submission Deadline Enforcement
description: Verify that assignment submissions are rejected after the due date and appropriate error is communicated.

steps.description: Login as Teacher and create an assignment with a due date/time in the near past.
Login as Student assigned to the course.
Attempt to submit the assignment after the due date.
Verify that submission is blocked and an error message states that the deadline has passed.

title: Guardian Read-Only Access Verification
description: Verify that Guardian role users can view linked students’ progress and assignments but have no modification privileges.

steps.description: Login as Guardian linked to one or more students.
Navigate to the dashboard and student progress pages.
Verify student course progress and assignment status are visible.
Attempt to edit or submit assignments on behalf of students.
Verify that no edit or submit options exist and actions are blocked.

title: API Integration with Supabase CRUD Operations
description: Verify all key CRUD operations through the application UI correctly invoke Supabase APIs and data syncs accurately.

steps.description: Perform user creation, reading, updating, and deletion through the UI.
Verify corresponding operations occur successfully in Supabase backend.
Create, update, and delete courses and assignments.
Verify backend data reflects UI changes immediately and real-time updates are pushed to relevant clients.
Upload and manage library content.
Validate storage usage and metadata correctness in Supabase Storage and Database.

title: Video Player Functionality
description: Verify the smart video player detects media type, supports playback for direct uploads and embedded YouTube/Vimeo videos, and tracks progress accurately.

steps.description: Upload a video file to library and select for course content.
Verify video plays within the integrated video player.
Add a video via YouTube or Vimeo URL.
Verify embedded video player loads external content and plays correctly.
Play videos partially and verify progress tracking updates.
Verify progress is saved persistently and visual progress indicators update.

title: Error Handling - 404 Page Navigation
description: Verify that navigating to invalid URLs displays the 404 not found error page with appropriate messaging and navigation options.

steps.description: Manually enter a non-existent URL path.
Verify the 404 error page is displayed with clear message and link to home or login.
